page.title: 01INTRODUCTION to the TOWN.
page.content: KENILWORTH is one of those {towns recorded in the{original Domesday Book as{"Chinewerde"}and is rich in history.{The Castle,}the{thatched {cottages}at{Little Virginia,}the {King's Arms and Castle hotel}and the {Common}all date back to those times. The{population}figure in{1985}is approximately{20.000.}Although still a {market town}its principal{industry}is {tourism.}Most of the{working {population commute}to nearby{Coventry and{Birmingham}and even to{London.}Its proximity to{The Royal Showground}and the{National Exhibition Centre}make it a{popular venue}for{industrial}and {business conferences}as well as for {tourists.}In the following pages we hope to{create an impression}for you of what it is like{living}in {Kenilworth}in the{1980's.
